# nanosecondsSinceStart

**Instance Property**

The time in nanoseconds since the start of the accelerometer data recording.

## Declaration

```swift
var nanosecondsSinceStart: Int64 { get }
```

## Accessing accelerometer data

- **samplingFrequency**: The frequency of the accelerometer data recording in hertz.
- **x**: The x-axis acceleration in G’s (gravitational force).
- **y**: The y-axis acceleration in G’s (gravitational force).
- **z**: The z-axis acceleration in G’s (gravitational force).
